name: apps.manifest.create
desc: Create an app from an app manifest.

manifest.desc: A JSON app manifest encoded as a string. This manifest **must** use a valid [app manifest schema - read our guide to creating one](/app-manifests/configuring-apps-with-app-manifests#fields).

errors.invalid_app: An app created from the provided manifest would not be valid.
errors.invalid_manifest: The provided manifest file does not validate against schema. Consult the additional errors field to locate specific issues.
errors.invalid_team_id: The provided team ID is not valid
errors.not_in_team: Cannot create an app in a team that user is not a member of
errors.failed_adding_collaborator: Failed writing a collaborator record for this new app
errors.failed_creating_app: Failed to create the app model
errors.ratelimited: Too many calls in succession to create endpoint during a short period of time.
